tool_description: Simple server which provides Web Push Notifications service to frontend applications.
name: Web Push Notifications Server
title: Web Push Notifications Server

api_list.name: Owner Info
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://web-push-notifications-server.p.rapidapi.com/owner/-your-owner-id-here-"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "web-push-notifications-server.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
